amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Federal government, when acquiring land in a State in which 50 percent or more of the land in the State is owned by the Federal government, to either dispose of an equal amount of land or obtain the approval of the State by State law before acquiring that land.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 106-612 to require the Federal government, when acquiring land in a state in which 50% or more of the land in the state is owned by the Federal government, to either dispose of and equal amount of land or obtain the approval of the state via passage of a specific state law before acquiring additional land.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Simpson amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 266 (Roll no. 171).
